about.summary: Provides a library for generic interval manipulations using a new interval vector class. Capabilities include: locating various kinds of relationships between two interval vectors, merging overlaps within a single interval vector, splitting an interval vector on its overlapping endpoints, and applying set theoretical operations on interval vectors. Many of the operations in this package were inspired by James Allen's interval algebra, Allen (1983) <doi:10.1145/182.358434>.

Provides a library for generic interval manipulations using a new interval vector class. Capabilities include: locating various kinds of relationships between two interval vectors, merging overlaps within a single interval vector, splitting an interval vector on its overlapping endpoints, and applying set theoretical operations on interval vectors. Many of the operations in this package were inspired by James Allen's interval algebra, Allen (1983) <doi:10.1145/182.358434>.

name: r-ivs
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ivs
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ivs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ivs/ivs_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e5de4c09437b0d4ca1c0e516bb094f51cc9dceb5239f6bd336d1f6722fd3afe2

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-glue >=1.6.2
    - r-rlang >=1.0.2
    - r-vctrs >=0.4.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-glue >=1.6.2
    - r-rlang >=1.0.2
    - r-vctrs >=0.4.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ivs')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ivs')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/DavisVaughan/ivs, https://davisvaughan.github.io/ivs/
  license: MIT
  summary: 'Provides a library for generic interval manipulations using a new interval vector
    class. Capabilities include: locating various kinds of relationships between two
    interval vectors, merging overlaps within a single interval vector, splitting an
    interval vector on its overlapping endpoints, and applying set theoretical operations
    on interval vectors. Many of the operations in this package were inspired by James
    Allen''s interval algebra, Allen (1983) <doi:10.1145/182.358434>.'
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
